title: 中国共产党喂养的五毛小犬欢呼澳洲山火肆虐乐不可支
contents:
脸书网友：

     Not the first time. Not a small population of PRC netizens cheer whenever tragedies happened to other countries.These kind of people, these jjanggae really hate us freedom lovers in their ice 🧊 cold 🥶hearts 💔. Supremacist mentality they truly exhibit. Yearning for global conquest by force.

        
         some sick people on this planet.
